title: The only time i've ever been able to stomp on Ahri
body:
Is when I wear her on the soles of my feet! >:D

https://i.gyazo.com/95d4a37a409b601f7d2416e7ccc3ca89.jpg

I took my chance when I saw it..
Im totally not petty at all....

Did anyone else get some League stuff from Auckland Armageddon?
_(ps. the distinct lack of Pax Sivir was of course, noted.)_

replies.body: Couldnt find much league merch there  😢😢😢 The tournament was alright though 🐒
I didn't realise it was on until Friday :P
